message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile purchase.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I think $1000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite willing to go that low. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you at $950000. This is a compromise that I think is fair for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $950000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $920000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $930000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can wrap things up here.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $930000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $910000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
